definition: to seek to recruit/to invite job applications from
to engage (a teacher etc)/to hire/to betroth/betrothal gift/to get married (of woman)

sentences.english: We are looking for energetic candidates with good caliber to join Shanghai Representative Office.
sentences.chinese: 我们诚聘充满活力及有才能的人士加入上海代表处。

sentences.english: Man cook wanted. Must be thoroughly experienced and English-speaking.
sentences.chinese: 诚聘男厨师一名，经验丰富，能说英语为佳。

sentences.english: With accelerating development, we are looking for the following positions to work in our Huizhou office.
sentences.chinese: 为了配合公司迅速发展，拟向社会诚聘如下精英。

sentences.english: With the diversification of products and corporate development, is now facing the community Employment.
sentences.chinese: 随着产品的多样化和公司的发展，现面向社会诚聘。

sentences.english: Due to the company's fast development, we need to recruit new talents for the following positions.
sentences.chinese: 因公司的迅速发展，现诚聘以下职位人员加入我公司。

sentences.english: To meet our continuing growth, we are seeking for the qualified applicants to fill in the position.
sentences.chinese: 为了公司的发展需要，我们诚聘所述人才。

sentences.english: Because of the fast development of business, we have following positions open.
sentences.chinese: 随着产品的多样化和公司的发展，现面向社会诚聘。

sentences.english: Looking for an experienced live-in nanny to look after our one-year-old.
sentences.chinese: 诚聘一位有经验的住家褓姆来照顾我们一岁大的孩子。

sentences.english: Due to fast development of our business in China, we are looking for competent candidates for the position.
sentences.chinese: 欧洲某跨国公司诚聘销售英才，在中国开创未来。

sentences.english: Due to company development needs, we want qualified lighting designers.
sentences.chinese: 现公司因发展需要，诚聘灯光设计英才。

sentences.english: The high salary invites Skilled tailoring labor, quality testing, backman.
sentences.chinese: 高薪诚聘熟练缝纫工，质检员，辅助工。

definition: to invite applications for a job/to recruit
to engage (a teacher etc)/to hire/to betroth/betrothal gift/to get married (of woman)
to hire at a high salary
specially engaged/employed or commissioned for a special task
